message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you like the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'll offer it to you for $105, which is a compromise between our previous offers.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $85. Can we meet at $85?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'll meet you at $92, which is still a good compromise for both of us.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I really like the product. Can we meet at $80?
